Headline: No trains between 35th-Bronzeville-IIT and 63rd/ Cottage Grove and Ashland/63rd
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th-Bronzeville-IIT & 63rd/Cottage Grove and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th-Bronzeville-IIT & 63rd/Cottage Grove and Ashland/63rd due to a stalled train at 63rd/Halsted.

Green Line trains will operate from Harlem/Lake to 35th-Bronzeville-IIT ONLY.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

If possible consider the Red Line as a service alternative to the Green Line at this time.

Also. as a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses are available as follows:

  • For 63rd/Cottage Grove-bound Green Line trains: from 35th-Bronzeville-IIT to 63rd/Cottage Grove to provide connecting service in both directions.
  • For Ashland/63rd-bound Green Line trains: from 35th-Bronzeville-IIT to Ashland/63rd to provide connecting service in both directions.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute near 55th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses temp. rerouted SB: Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and 57th; NB Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove, 55th and Woodlawn: near 55th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 55th/Woodlawn, due to street blockage near 55th/Woodlawn.

Southbound buses will operate via 55th, Ellis and 57th including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove, 55th and Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
